subject: Re: Perl-cgi execution problem
body:
On 5/10/07, I BioKid  wrote:

> I need to implement a perl script that will generate response page and at
> the same time submit the program to  the  server and once it is done, it
> should send a mail.

Randal did something similar in his 20th Web Techniques column. It's
not quite the same as you need; but he shows how to fork a background
process while the foreground process serves up a web response.

    http://www.stonehenge.com/merlyn/WebTechniques/col20.html

Does that show you enough to get further? Good luck with it!

--Tom Phoenix
Stonehenge Perl Training
